title: ‘Resilient Pakistan’ author Haya Fatima calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 27 (APP): Haya Fatima Sehgal, the author of the book titled “Resilient Pakistan” on Wednesday called on Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar.
Her book is a compilation of her articles and features with a dedicated section on people who devoted their lives for serving the country.
The book covers topics such as cultural is­sues, fighting extremism and climate change.
